item.title: INFY
item.description: score:95 Chances: Infosys has shown strong growth in its omnichannel and AI-first offerings, which has led to significant customer growth and transaction volumes. The company’s strategic collaborations with TK Elevator and Proximus demonstrate its commitment to modernizing and transforming digital landscapes for its clients.
